https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3X5w17elLbJj2LxCHbivCk8CZJA.jpg A giant bloodthirsty Easter bunny starts viciously killing the local townsfolk. When the Mayor refuses to act and the attacks grow more gruesome, the town finds its very survival in the hands of a wannabe actress and a crazy dog-catcher. Beaster Day: Here Comes Peter Cottonhell
